member.name: IPublishedApp2.Install2
member.summary: Installs an application published by an application publisher, while preventing multiple windows from being active on the same thread.
member.param: A handle to the parent window.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPublishedApp2
member.summary: Extends the interface by providing an additional installation method.
